div.div: Accumulation of overlap for concurrent predator and fishery presence in a grid cell.
div.p: A) Spatial grid of 0.25째 longitude x 0.125째latitude, temporal scale of 1 day. B) Spatial grid of 1째 longitude x 0.5째 latitude, temporal scale of 1 month. C) Spatial grid of SSMU, temporal scale of 1 year. Note that scale bars differ for each panel and axes for panel A differ from panels B and C.
